entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization‚Äîresizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: tarekst/emoji-steg: A lightweight TypeScript library for Unicode steganography in emojis. With this library, text can be hidden in a single emoji, making the encrypted text invisible and only decryptable with the correct password.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript library for Unicode steganography in emojis. With this library, text can be hidden in a single emoji, making the encrypted text invisible and only decryptable with the correct password.

entry.title: flufy3d/JianpuRender: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.

entry.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

entry.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. üöÄ

entry.title: dakohhh/mongoose-paginator: A lightweight, flexible, and TypeScript-friendly pagination utility for Mongoose models. This package provides a class-based approach to handling database pagination with support for filtering, sorting, population, projection, and metadata customization ‚Äî all without relying on heavy plugins.
entry.content: A lightweight, flexible, and TypeScript-friendly pagination utility for Mongoose models. This package provides a class-based approach to handling database pagination with support for filtering, sorting, population, projection, and metadata customization ‚Äî all without relying on heavy plugins.
